attributes.action: comission a full and UNBIASED research project into all aspects of drug use in this country. Including the ramifications of legalsing certain recreational drugs and it's effects on the economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My friends and I firmly believe that if the government were to legalise drugs across the board, with certain measures in place (in the manner of age limits) then this country would be a much better place. Government could tax drugs available and it would still sell for less than the dealers could supply it for.
